channel.title: What’s the longest you’ve worked on a song?
channel.description: I’ve working on a song for an entire month And I pretty much hate The way it sounds now XD. What’s the longest one you’ve worked on? Also: I mean main songs-not side projects.

item.title: What’s the longest you’ve worked on a song?
item.dc:creator: LimeZ
item.description:
Like, a month.

Read full topic

item.title: What’s the longest you’ve worked on a song?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
This song is actually starting to get close to nearly 10 months in total of work as I decide to go and mix it fully in FL studio to make it high enough quality for full digital release (Spotify etc.) Although that can’t top a full year it’s certainly something I didn’t expect when I first wrote this song xD

Read full topic

item.title: What’s the longest you’ve worked on a song?
item.dc:creator: Zoruwhite
item.description:
I doubt it was a release schedule problem more that my activity mostly consisted of reposts… or maybe they were bots or people who followed just for one track… im just rambling on, but I believe that i cant blame my release schedule, i just need to get better

item.title: What’s the longest you’ve worked on a song?
item.dc:creator: Pinewoodog
item.description:
The longes would probably be 3 months, since I didn’t have much time to devote to music during that period.

But, if I’ve got an idea, I can belt out a full track in under an hour.

item.source: What’s the longest you’ve worked on a song?

item.title: What’s the longest you’ve worked on a song?
item.dc:creator: Stigmo
item.description:
From what I can still remember it was my track Cyborg. I worked on that for about 1 month, mainly because I couldn’t finish it quickly due to my busy schedule. By the time I was able to finish and upload it, I didn’t even like it anymore.
That’s one flaw of mine; the longer I work on tracks, the less I like them…

Read full topic

item.title: What’s the longest you’ve worked on a song?
item.dc:creator: INDIR3CT
item.description:
I can’t really estimate the span of days I work on a song, sometimes it’s various.

But I definitely spend about 18-22 hours on each track. So approx. 3-4 weeks. On bigger tracks or collaborations, I spend more hours/days
